data.prayer: Spirit, give the disciples of the the state of Biškek words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Biškek, Kyrgyzstan
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, convict the 2,711 believers in Biškek to be holy and righteous. Inspire them to gather in small groups for accountability and spiritual growth.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 330 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the state of Biškek to agree with you in prayer.
data.verse: I [Jesus] pray also for those who will believe in me through their message, that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: Father, bring yourself glory in Biškek. Through your servants plant 179 new churches that love you, love one another, and make disciples this year.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the LORD as the waters cover the sea.

data.prayer: Lord, remember the Chechen people. Make the Chechen people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Spirit, guide someone in the church in the state of Biškek to a person ready to receive the message of the gospel, like Lydia, and who will then open her home to faith.
data.verse: One of those listening was a woman from the city of Thyatira named Lydia, a dealer in purple cloth. She was a worshiper of God. The Lord opened her heart to respond to Paul’s message.

data.prayer: Jesus, teach the believers in the state of Biškek that love for you and obedience to you are connected.
data.verse: If you love me, keep my commands.

data.prayer: Father, help the stressed and anxious in Biškek, Kyrgyzstan know that you care for them today.
data.verse: Cast your cares on the Lord and he will sustain you; he will never let the righteous be shaken.

location.name: Biškek
location.people_groups_list: Hemshin, Azerbaijani, Romani, Domari, Kalmyk-Oirat, Kyrgyz
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Hemshin (1,100), Azerbaijani (22,000), Romani, Domari (500), Kalmyk-Oirat (3,700), Kyrgyz (4,698,000)
